name: Mautic Trigger
natural_language_description: 这是 Mautic Trigger 节点。主要用于: Handle Mautic events via webhooks

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: credentials

events.name: events
events.description: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression
events.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event Names or IDs | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

eventsOrder.name: eventsOrder
eventsOrder.description: Order direction for queued events in one webhook. Can be “DESC” or “ASC”.
eventsOrder.natural_language_description: 参数名: Events Order | 作用: Order direction for queued events in one webhook. Can be “DESC” or “ASC”. | 默认值: ASC
